scripts.dev: npm run p-build-debug && cross-env REACT_APP_API_URL=http://192.168.1.22:2001 react-app-rewired start
scripts.start-without-front: npm run p-build-debug && node -e "const { paths } = require('./config-overrides.js'); paths({});" start.js
scripts.build: cross-env  PUBLIC_URL=/plugins/keepix-polygon-plugin/view react-app-rewired build && npm run p-build-all
scripts.p-build-debug: cd src/ && go build -ldflags "-X main.version=$(npm pkg get version)" -o ../build/dist/keepix-polygon-plugin
scripts.p-build-release-osx-x64: cd src/ && cross-env GOOS=darwin cross-env GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags "-X main.version=$(npm pkg get version)" -o ../build/dist/osx-x64/keepix-polygon-plugin
scripts.p-build-release-osx-arm64: cd src/ && cross-env GOOS=darwin cross-env GOARCH=arm64 go build -ldflags "-X main.version=$(npm pkg get version)" -o ../build/dist/osx-arm64/keepix-polygon-plugin
scripts.p-build-release-linux-x64: cd src/ && cross-env GOOS=linux cross-env GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags "-X main.version=$(npm pkg get version)" -o ../build/dist/linux-x64/keepix-polygon-plugin
scripts.p-build-release-linux-arm64: cd src/ && cross-env GOOS=linux cross-env GOARCH=arm64 go build -ldflags "-X main.version=$(npm pkg get version)" -o ../build/dist/linux-arm64/keepix-polygon-plugin
scripts.p-build-release-win-x64: cd src/ && cross-env GOOS=windows cross-env GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags "-X main.version=$(npm pkg get version)" -o ../build/dist/win-x64/keepix-polygon-plugin.exe
scripts.p-build-all: npm run p-build-release-osx-x64 && npm run p-build-release-osx-arm64 && npm run p-build-release-linux-x64 && npm run p-build-release-linux-arm64 && npm run p-build-release-win-x64
